Cherry Canyon Park.address: 4157 Hampstead Rd , La Canada Flintridge , CA 91011-3838
reviewComments: Go early. Pretty easy. You can look down to Descanso Gardens when you reach the top. Easy parking. Quick hike.

The Lanterman House Museum.address: 4420 Encinas Dr , La Canada Flintridge , CA 91011-3313
reviewComments: This house was built by an early settler and shows an upper middle class home of the early 20th century in a suburb of Los Angeles and Pasadena. It has many Craftsman details.
